name: KatKin
description:
Revolutionising how parents feed cats by bringing to market fresh, personalised and species appropriate nutrition. Global cat food spend is a $34 billion market and the fastest growing segment within pet food. $8BN premium spend and increasing 1 percentage point year-on-year; driven by both the humanisation of pets and owners' own desire for fresh, all-natural foods. 

Despite the rise of fresh pet food particularly is the US where the concept is well proven by NomNomNow, Farmer's Dog and MyOllie, cats have been left behind by new entrants. This is nothing new - cats continue to be the industry underdog as legacy FMCG companies have never formulated cat food for cats as obligate carnivores despite it being an absolute biological necessity. 

We're launching a world leading personalised nutrition and wellness brand for cats and their parents.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineering Lead
jobs.description:
WHAT WE'RE DOING

Revolutionising how parents feed cats by bringing to market fresh, personalised and species appropriate nutrition. Global cat food spend is a $34 billion market and the fastest growing segment within pet food. $8BN premium spend and increasing 1 percentage point year-on-year; driven by both the humanisation of pets and owners' own desire for fresh, all-natural foods. 

Despite the rise of fresh pet food particularly is the US where the concept is well proven by NomNomNow, Farmer's Dog and MyOllie, cats have been left behind by new entrants. This is nothing new - cats continue to be the industry underdog as legacy FMCG companies have never formulated cat food for cats as obligate carnivores despite it being an absolute biological necessity. 

We're launching a world leading personalised nutrition and wellness brand for cats and their parents. 

We are doing this through world-leading expertise (including leveraging the best US expertise available), using technology for in-house production and personalisation, to offer the best possible food, and in time will make it accessible and affordable for every cat and their parents. Our brand celebrates cats as companions at the heart of the home, and while we are laser focused on our core food proposition, we will build a one-stop club for cat parents. 

We're at the start of a very exciting journey. After spending 12 months developing our concept and product, we launched in January. We are backed with a $1M angel round from some of London's best VCs and angels and will raise a further round in H2 2020.

THE ROLE & WHAT WE NEED

We're growing our team and this is our first in-house tech lead. You have the ability to start and establish our in-house tech team as the first-hire. We need an experienced, senior level engineer with wide experience across the stack to own and grow our technology product. 

Engineers with experience at an D2C e-commerce start up move to the front of the line. i.e - experience with AB testing, analytics, pixel placement, ESPs, referral programs, loyalty programs, WMS, ERP, credit card processing, stripe, etc.

Ideally, you're someone who's worked with startups, designers & marketers before, and are comfortable making decisions around both technology and the business.

OUR STACK

Our stack is built with a variety of tools and languages. There's a  Shopify site (backend) with a single page application for the on-boarding flow on the front-end. Recharge (a Shopify extension) is used to manage subscriptions. We have a number of integrations and need to synchronise data between these. This is the start of our journey and you have the ability to influence our future direction as we scale.

YOUR SKILLS

+ Expert in Ruby on Rails, especially using it as an API
+ Fluency in SQL and extensive experience with PostgreSQL or MySQL
+ Expert level client-side Javascript + React/Redux or other state management and component based UI development framework
+ Experience with Node.js and knowledge of server-side Javascript
+ Eye for design, demonstrable experience collaborating with visual and UX designers (+ general knowledge of UX best practices)
+ Familiarity with Shopify/Liquid and e-commerce best practices strongly preferred
+ Strong understanding of git and version control

OPPORTUNITY 

+ Own and grow the tech function
+ Backed by some of Europe's top VC investors
+ Meaningful equity pre our next funding round.
